subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After the rich green of Wimbledon and the red clay of Paris, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer will deepen their rivalry on the bright blue hardcourt in Rod Laver Arena on Sunday night.
snippet: After the rich green of Wimbledon and the red clay of Paris, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer will deepen their rivalry on the bright blue hardcourt in Rod Laver Arena on Sunday night.
